short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Footprint Me tool allows you to create a digital inventory of your online accounts. Learn more on www.arrivederci.me

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a test version (beta) of Footprint Me Chrome Extension provided by Arrivederci Me and is still under development. 

This tool is an assistant helping to create a list of your online accounts (website address and username only). This is not a password manager. Footprint Me is a part of toolset offered by Arrivederci Me created to support the Will-making process, organising your digital legacy for you in one place. 

Check www.arrivederci.me to learn about the toolset and what we do.
